alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 11:59AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Santa Barbara County through 1215 PM PST... At 1158 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lompoc, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. Weak tornado possible, wind gusts 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lompoc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast
